definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Objective To compare diffenrent amounts of the glycyrrhizic acid extracted by two methods-decoct method and Ammonia-water method.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較水酸法和氨水法提取甘草酸含量的變化。

sentences.english: Ammonia or hot sauce based deer repellents are allowed.
sentences.chinese: 可以用氨水或者辣醬製成的驅鹿劑。

sentences.english: Addition of ammonia improves the dispersity of the products.
sentences.chinese: 以氨水爲燃燒調節劑，可以提高產物的分散性。

sentences.english: He also replaced the toxic ammonia that had been the original cooling agent.
sentences.chinese: 他還更換了用作最早冷卻劑的帶毒性的氨水。

sentences.english: When the pressure is released, the ammonia evaporates and is recycled.
sentences.chinese: 壓力釋放後，氨水會揮發出來並加以回收。

sentences.english: One of these is a mixture of ammonia and water.
sentences.chinese: 其中一種是氨水混合液。

sentences.english: The lysine can be desorbed rapidly with ammonia.
sentences.chinese: 用氨水可將吸附的賴氨酸迅速解吸。

sentences.english: An improved direct extraction method for preparation of neodymium iso-octanate with NaOH instead of NH 3·H 2O was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 用氫氧化鈉溶液代替氨水直接萃取法制備異辛酸釹。

sentences.english: Pluto's companion Charon might be covered with active volcanoes of ammonia-rich water spewing forth from the moon's deep interior.
sentences.chinese: 冥王星的夥伴喀戎可能覆蓋着從活火山噴出的氨水。
